import React, { useState } from 'react' import useForm from './useForm' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; const Todo = () => { const [task, settask] = useForm({ title:"",quantity:0,description:"" }) const [shown, isShown] = useState(false) const submitData=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() console.log('clicked') console.log(task.title) console.log(task.quantity) console.log(task.description) isShown(true) } return (

Todo List

{task.task1}
Title:{task.title} Quantity:{task.quantity} Description:{task.description} {shown ?
Todo {task.title} {task.quantity} {task.description}
:0}
) } export default Todo
